metadata.title: CVE-2022-3820 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2. GitLab was not performingcorrect authentication with some Package Registries when IP addressrestrictions were configured, allowing an attacker already in possession ofa valid Deploy Token to misuse it from any location.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
